pkgmetadata.longdescription: RNA-Seq Power Simulation // Provides functions for estimating power or sample size for RNA-Seq studies. Empirical approach is used and the data is assumed to be count in nature. The underlying distribution of data is assumed to be Poisson or negative binomial. The package contains 6 function; 4 functions provide estimates of sample size or power for Poisson and Negative Binomial distribution; 2 functions provide plots of power for given sample size or sample size for given power.
